```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)

knit_hooks$set(plot=function(x, options) {
  sprintf("<img src='../%s%s-%d.%s'/ title='%s'/>", 
          options$fig.path, options$label, options$fig.cur, options$fig.ext, options$fig.cap)

})

opts_chunk$set(
  echo=TRUE,
  fig.path="static/geoknife-troubleshoot/",
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.height = 6,
  fig.cap = "TODO",
  toggle = FALSE
)

knit_hooks$set(toggle = function(before, options, envir) {
  if(options$toggle){
    if(before) {
      print('<div id="hideMe" style="display:none">')
    }
    # else {
    #   print('</div>)
    # }
  }
})

set.seed(1)
```
